title: Can we for the love of God nerf Diana already?
body: I have no idea why this champion is allowed to 1 shot any1 in less than half a second just by pressing her point click ult that doesn't even have a cooldown. Whether she's feeding or nto she'll still deal insane dmg if not one shot you I had that game where she was 2/11 and I could 1v1 her but she pressed qr and I died A 2/11 FUCKING Diana. Jesus christ riot

replies.body: Yeah her q is point and click

> [{quoted}](name=Adequate Top,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yLhx0fZt,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-09-04T22:27:54.631+0000)
>
> Yeah her q is point and click

Her q is like almost impossible to miss. It's not a real skillshot and the circle thingy In the end makes it way easier to land it

Play a squishy, get fucked.

For real though, Diana can't one shot like that unless extremely fed, which all burst champs do anyway. And a 2-11 at that, HA! That would be the day if one that behind could one shot- meaning NEVER.

{{champion:107}} *Laughs in bush kitty*

For real though, You played Eveylnn, A squishy assassin that is still a part of Riots old "Delayed burst" Mindset from a little bit back vs one of the few assassins that didn't get touched, Assassins are meant to delete squishy champs of which an assassin is.

> [{quoted}](name=Tik115,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yLhx0fZt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-09-04T20:13:00.092+0000)
>
> {{champion:107}} *Laughs in bush kitty*
> 
> For real though, You played Eveylnn, A squishy assassin that is still a part of Riots old "Delayed burst" Mindset from a little bit back vs one of the few assassins that didn't get touched, Assassins are meant to delete squishy champs of which an assassin is.

I agree I totally do but she was 2/11 she was fucked the whole game and then bought 2 items and 1 shotted squishies. If I'm 2/11 with a rengar or any other assassin I witn be able to delete Some1 in less than a second but Diana does. The moment Diana goes 6 and gets proly an item then say bye bye to the game cuz she'll insta delete any1 without reaction time
Ahem, Diana is not an assassin, she's a diver. And she can't one shot a squishy unless she's like 12-0 and up a few levels than you.
